description.en: The Yi series models are the next generation of open-source large language models trained from scratch by 01.AI.
description.zh: Yi系列模型是01.AI训练的最新一代开源大型语言模型。

description.en: MiniCPM is a series of end-to-end large models jointly released by the FaceWall Intelligent and the Tsinghua University Natural Language Processing Laboratory.
description.zh: MiniCPM 是面壁智能与清华大学自然语言处理实验室共同开源的系列端侧大模型，主体语言模型 MiniCPM-2B 仅有 24亿（2.4B）的非词嵌入参数量, 总计2.7B参数量。

description.en: Ready-to-use OCR with 80+ supported languages and all popular writing scripts including: Latin, Chinese, Arabic, Devanagari, Cyrillic, etc.
description.zh: 易于使用的 OCR 解决方案，支持 80+ 种语言。适用于快速实施。

description.en: Surya is a document OCR toolkit supporting 90+ languages and performs similarly to cloud services, providing line-level text detection, layout analysis (such as table, image, title detection), and reading order detection.
description.zh: Surya是一个文档OCR工具包，支持90多种语言的识别且性能媲美云端服务，提供行级文本检测、布局分析（如表格、图像、标题等的检测）及阅读顺序检测。

description.en: Awesome multilingual OCR toolkits based on PaddlePaddle (practical ultra lightweight OCR system, support 80+ languages recognition, provide data annotation and synthesis tools, support training and deployment among server, mobile, embedded and IoT devices)
description.zh: 基于 PaddlePaddle 的优秀多语言 OCR 工具包（实用的超轻量级 OCR 系统，支持 80 多种语言识别，提供数据标注和合成工具，支持在服务器、移动设备、嵌入式设备和物联网设备上进行训练和部署）

description.en: DeepSpeech is an open source embedded (offline, on-device) speech-to-text engine which can run in real time on devices ranging from a Raspberry Pi 4 to high power GPU servers.
description.zh: DeepSpeech 是一个开源的嵌入式（离线、设备上）语音到文本引擎，可以在从 Raspberry Pi 4 到高功率 GPU 服务器的设备上实时运行。

description.en: Easy-to-use Speech Toolkit including Self-Supervised Learning model, SOTA/Streaming ASR with punctuation, Streaming TTS with text frontend, Speaker Verification System, End-to-End Speech Translation and Keyword Spotting. Won NAACL2022 Best Demo Award.
description.zh: 一个基于 PaddlePaddle 的开源语音识别工具包，旨在提供一套全面的语音识别、合成及相关任务的工具。

description.en: A Fundamental End-to-End Speech Recognition Toolkit and Open Source SOTA Pretrained Models, Supporting Speech Recognition, Voice Activity Detection, Text Post-processing etc.
description.zh: 一个基于 PaddlePaddle 的开源语音识别工具包，旨在提供一套全面的语音识别、合成及相关任务的工具。

description.en: Robust Speech Recognition via Large-Scale Weak Supervision
description.zh: 通过大规模弱监督实现鲁棒的语音识别

description.en: Facebook AI Research's Automatic Speech Recognition Toolkit
description.zh: Facebook AI Research 的自动语音识别工具包

description.en: ChatTTS is a text-to-speech model designed specifically for dialogue scenarios such as LLM assistant.
description.zh: ChatTTS 是一个为对话场景（如 LLM 助手）设计的文本到语音模型。

description.en: Multi-lingual large voice generation model, providing inference, training and deployment full-stack ability.
description.zh: 多语言大语音生成模型，提供推理、训练和部署全栈能力。

description.en: Coqui TTS is a fast, local neural text to speech system.
description.zh: Coqui TTS 是一个快速、本地神经文本到语音系统。

description.en: A fast, local neural text to speech system.
description.zh: 一个快速、本地神经文本到语音系统。

description.en: TTS is a library for advanced Text-to-Speech generation.
description.zh: TTS 是一个用于高级文本到语音生成的库。
